DOC.brief_title: The Influence Oral Vibrational Stimulation Cognitive Function Elderly Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluating effect oral vibratory stimulus brain activity cognitive function elderly people mild cognitive impairment ◇ Test design : Open-labeled , prospective , pre-post study ○ Oral vibratory stimulus : As optimal algorithm drawn first year study , vibratory stimulus apply 10 time 15 day ( 5-minute stimulus apply two time day 10 day , compose repeat 15-second vibratory 15-second non-vibratory stimulus strength 3.3V ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria A person least 20 natural teeth , include first molar ( include fix prosthesis implant , exclude removable prosthesis ) A person systemic health , include control hypertension/hypotension diabetes patient An elderly person diagnose normal cognition mild cognitive impairment neuropsychological test CERAD clinical evaluation ( refer separate inclusion criterion ) Exclusion Criteria A person medical history nervous system disease A person ever allergic resin A person untreated periodontal disease and/or severely loose teeth A person medical treatment history temporomandibular disorder , occurrence stomatitis per month within last 6 month , currently stomatitis A person receive receive treatment major mental disease dementia , major depression , mania base DSMIV diagnosis A person medical disease serious effect cognitive function take related medicine A person transplant electrically mechanically operated cerebrovascular clip claustrophobia MRI scan impossible
